children.title: OIL (MORE THAN 1000L/YEAR)

children.text: HOMEWARMING + OPHA, EPI, INSTANT SAVINGS, FRIDGE RETIREMENT
children.content:
HomeWarming

Keep your home comfortable and energy efficient with a no-charge energy assessment and a wide variety of free home improvement upgrades for low-income-qualified homeowners.


LEARN MORE


Free Energy Efficient Product Installation

Let one of our qualified Efficiency Partners install energy efficient products in your home at no cost to you. Whether you rent or own, we can help you save. Not only is installation free but so are the products we install. Book now and start saving today!


BOOK AN INSTALLATION


Instant Savings

Visit participating retailers across the province for instant in-store rebates on dozens of energy efficient products for your home. Product variety updates year-round!


FIND REBATES NEAR YOU



Do you also have a 10+ year old working fridge & freezer?

GET $50 WITH APPLIANCE RETIREMENT

children.content:
Home Energy Assessment

A Home Energy Assessment will tell you see where your home is losing heat, what you can do to improve it, and what home energy rebates and interest-free financing you may be eligible for. Book yours today!


LEARN MORE


Free Energy Efficient Product Installation
